title: Sunshine After the Rain
description: When Sarah's world is devastated in the blink of an eye, she's left behind with the broken pieces of her former life. Trying to navigate through the grief she's faced with, and struggling to let go of her pain, she meets a stranger who helps her see you can learn to love someone while still loving another from your past.Will Sarah grow from her pain and search for happiness, or will she succumb to the darkness she's afraid to crawl out of?
author: H. Pearce
